column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " Spare coins for weary travelers ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " This is humiliating !
#Text=Spare change for a hungry old man ?
#Text=" Peasant girl says : " Aw , here you go .
#Text=" Iroh says : " The coin is appreciated , but not as much as your smile !
#Text=" Broadsword man says : " How about some entertainment in exchange for ... a gold piece ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " We 're not performers .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Not professional anyway .
#Text=It 's a long , long way to Ba Sing Se , but the girls in the city , they look so pretty !
#Text=" Broadsword man says : " Come on , we 're talking a gold piece here !
#Text=Let 's see some action !
#Text=Dance !
#Text=" Iroh says : " They kiss so sweet that you really got to meet the girls from Ba Sing Se !
#Text=" Broadsword man says : " Ha , ha !
#Text=Nothing like a fat man dancing for his dinner !
#Text=Here ya go !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Such a kind man .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , you taking us down for a reason ?
#Text=Aang , why are we going down ?
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=I did n't even notice .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Are you noticing now ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Is something wrong ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I know this is going to sound weird , but I think the swamp is calling to me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Is it telling you where we can get something to eat ?
#Text=" Aang says : " No , I ... I think it wants us to land there .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No offense to the swamp , but I do n't see any land there to land on .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=Bumi said to learn earthbending I would have to wait and listen , and now I 'm actually hearing the earth .
#Text=Do you want me to ignore it ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yes .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't know .
#Text=There 's something ominous about that place .
#Text=" Sokka says : " See , even Appa and Momo do n't like it here .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , since everyone feels so strongly about this , bye swamp .
#Text=Yip , Yip !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You better throw in an extra " yip " !
#Text=We got ta move !
#Text=" Aang says : " Where 's Appa and Momo ?
#Text=Appa !
#Text=Momo !
#Text="
